long_description: Merrell Traveler Fisher Sandals know a thing or two about comfort and offer up the stability and traction you need to navigate adventures from wandering downtown to around the world. Leather and canvas uppers have buckles that adjust the fit. M Select Move footframe gives you an ideal combination of natural flex, contoured support and performance cushioning for all-day comfort. Footbeds and breathable mesh linings are treated with M Select odor control to keep the sandals smelling fresh. Molded nylon arch shanks provide good support. Air cushions in the heels absorb shock and add stability. Outsoles on the Merrell Traveler Fisher Sandals are tuned to grip when and where you need it.
short_description: Merrell Traveler Fisher Sandals know a thing or two about comfort and offer up the stability and traction you need to navigate adventures from wandering downtown to around the world.
